titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Victoria Andritz collection of Brooklyn Life issues and Ruth Ann Shipley wedding photographs 2000.003
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-22T11:00-0500

did.unittitle: Victoria Andritz collection of Brooklyn Life issues and Ruth Ann Shipley wedding photographs
did.abstract: This collection contains items donated to the Brooklyn Historical Society by Victoria Andritz, including various issues of Brooklyn Life, a weekly illustrated periodical for Brooklyn and Long Island, and two wedding photographs of Ruth Ann Shipley and her bridal party.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Life issues and Ruth Ann Shipley wedding photographs, 2000.003, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Gift of Victoria Andritz, date unknown. Formally accessioned in 2000.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
